it.polimi.se2019.network

Class WaitingRoom

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.network.WaitingRoom

  • public class WaitingRoom
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Galli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WaitingRoom create(int duration)
      Since WaitingRoom is singleton, this method create new instance of WaitingRoom only if is the first time
      static void deleteMatch(GameHandler gameHandler)
      This method disconnect all the players and delete the match.
      void disconnect(Server server, PlayerView view, int matchID)
      Disconnect a player from the match specified After the execution of the method the Model can't communicate with the Client View anymore If the match hasn't started yet, the player will be deleted from the waiting player
      void handleLoginMessage(java.lang.String nickname, int matchID, Server networkHandler)
      Register a new user to the match
      void handleSettingMessage(int map, int skulls, boolean suddenDeath)
      Set the parameter of the player If two player have access to this method, only the first one is served
      void receiveMessage(HandlerConfigMessage message, Server sender)
      Receive a message from the player's server

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static WaitingRoom create(int duration)
        Since WaitingRoom is singleton, this method create new instance of WaitingRoom only if is the first time
        Parameters:
        duration - Duration of timer in seconds
        Returns:
        The instance of WaitingRoom
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if duration is minor than 0

      • receiveMessage

        public void receiveMessage(HandlerConfigMessage message,
                           Server sender)
        Receive a message from the player's server
        Parameters:
        message - the message
        sender - the sender

      • handleLoginMessage

        public void handleLoginMessage(java.lang.String nickname,
                               int matchID,
                               Server networkHandler)
        Register a new user to the match
        Parameters:
        nickname - the nickname chosen
        matchID - the match's id the user want to join
        networkHandler - the sender of the request

      • handleSettingMessage

        public void handleSettingMessage(int map,
                                 int skulls,
                                 boolean suddenDeath)
        Set the parameter of the player If two player have access to this method, only the first one is served
        Parameters:
        map - the number of the map chosen
        skulls - the number of skull of the game
        suddenDeath - if the player want play with the sudden death modality

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(Server server,
                       PlayerView view,
                       int matchID)
        Disconnect a player from the match specified After the execution of the method the Model can't communicate with the Client View anymore If the match hasn't started yet, the player will be deleted from the waiting player
        Parameters:
        server - Player's server who has to be disconnected
        view - Player's view who has to be disconnected
        matchID - Player's match's ID who has to be disconnected

      • deleteMatch

        public static void deleteMatch(GameHandler gameHandler)
        This method disconnect all the players and delete the match. After this method another user can log in with the same nickname To call when a match is over.
        Parameters:
        gameHandler - Match's GameHandler which has to be deleted.
